title: Next.Limit.Technologies.XFlow.2014-SSQ
description:
XFlow - is a powerful innovative technology CFD (Computational Fluid Dynamics - CFD), using zapantentovanny and based on the particle method ("particle-based") Lagrangian approach for solving complex problems traditionally fluid dynamics at all stages of the design and refinement of future products.
XFlow designed to simulate the flow of gases, liquids and solutions of heat transfer problems.
In solving the problems of this class allows you to simultaneously consider XFlow kinematics and dynamics design, physics, multiphase flows, subsonic and supersonic conditions, acoustics and design interaction with the liquid.
Designed specifically for engineers and calculators, usually requiring fast and accurate solutions for complex flow behavior, XFlow allows complex numerical simulations in a simple and understandable way relieves the user from setting a large number of algorithmic parameters and traditionally time-consuming process of building a gas-dynamic grids on complex geometry.
CFD technology embedded in the XFlow, demonstrates the ability to simulate the behavior of complex flow with real environment and the possibility of a significant reduction in cost and time, thus offering a real alternative to holding many expensive eksperimentov.
Year / Issue Date: 2014
Version: 2014 Build 92
Developer: Next Limit Technologies

www.xflowcfd.com
Bit: 64bit
Language: English
